revised_title: Meteorite Stones and Native Iron: Historical Accounts and Experiments
tldr: This article presents three instances of meteorite stones that fell in France and a lump of native iron that fell in India. The author, Charles Greville, discusses the characteristics and texture of these stones and the process of extracting native iron from them. The article also includes a translation from Persian about a similar event that occurred during the reign of Emperor Jehangire. The author believes this to be an authentic account, as the Emperor was not a figure one would attempt to deceive.
